name: Infinity Dice
description:
Infinity Dice is a platformer with a focus on combat with your custom-made dice.

Pressing E will access the dice menu where you are able to pick which attack is on each side of the die. You can then use that die in combat by clicking in the direction you want to throw it. Whichever side lands up is the attack that is taken over a small area around the die.

However, building a die is not as easy as it sounds. Dice have a specific threshold for sides that can’t be crossed when building the die (represented by the red numbers in the menus).

Can you be the first to reach the Infinity-sided die and unlock its mysteries?
